name: Skeet Ninja
description:
Entry for Score Space Game Jam  #12

Controls 

Move left - Left Arrow or A

Move right- Right Arrow or D

Jump - Up Arrow or W (You get 1 double jump in the air)

Fast fall - Down Arrow or S

Slash - X or K

Kunai - C or L

here's the premade assets I used 

https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle

https://finalgatestudios.itch.io/ninja-asset-pack

Animations Edited By Evil Tomato
